entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.1°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -8.1°C

Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or freezing drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
